answer:
Tips for locating immunization records. If you are unable to locate your records, the BC Routine Immunization Schedule - ADULTS 18 YEARS OF AGE AND OLDER NOT IMMUNIZED IN CHILDHOOD would be followed. Vaccine eligiblity includes your date of birth and any health conditions or risks. Publicly funded (free) vaccines are available from most pharmacies, some doctors' offices and all health units. Use the health unit finder. 
Immunization Nurse
